meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: LEAD: Impellitteri Dies at 86 Vincent R. Impellitteri, Mayor of New York from 1950 to 1953, died in a Bridgeport, Conn., hospital. He was 86 years old. Page B8. 2 Airlines Slash Fares Continental and Eastern said they would cut discount domestic fares as much as 40 percent but would make the tickets nonrefundable.

Impellitteri Dies at 86 Vincent R. Impellitteri, Mayor of New York from 1950 to 1953, died in a Bridgeport, Conn., hospital. He was 86 years old. Page B8. 2 Airlines Slash Fares Continental and Eastern said they would cut discount domestic fares as much as 40 percent but would make the tickets nonrefundable. Page A16.
